info.name: [SD] Bulk DELETE users
info.description:
This collection will delete users using a .csv as an input.

Author: Hern√°n Aranda (a.k.a. Hernium)

# Prerequisites

Check this article to prepare everything you need: [https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources](https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources)

# Template

| **Column** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| userId | Required. Id of the user to be deleted. |

Source: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10cN2GcwdoPv8x8-5K6YKi1zdxbbaGsW_IWTTL9CuGnY/view#gid=1934409141](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10cN2GcwdoPv8x8-5K6YKi1zdxbbaGsW_IWTTL9CuGnY/view#gid=1934409141)

# Execution

1. Set and select the enviroment, or replace the enviroment variables with your constants
2. Create the .csv file
3. Run the collection using the .csv file
    

# Requests

exec: // If we got a 200, the request was executed succesfully
